entry.title: CTV dramatically improves DLCs
entry.summary: Jeremy has developed a prototype of a protocol in Sapio and shared the link to it on GitHub. He invites others to test and tweak the protocol using the provided benchmark. Jeremy tested one oracle with 100,000 different payouts and observed it taking around 13 seconds on a release build. He intends to experiment more with the protocol, but acknowledges that Sapio Studio may not be able to handle a GUI for 100,000 nodes.
